lines.text: I'm sorry about this mornin', alright? I mean, we didn't hurt *you*! Shit man, that guy, he was just a nigger!
That *nigger* was my best friend, you motherfucker!
If you're lying, I'll be back.
This "Exterminator" is the most dangerous serial killer in the United States and he is in New York City! Now what do you think about all this?
I think you need to take a shit. It's coming out of your mouth instead of your asshole.
The man was nothing but a nigger.
You really are a sick motherfucker, you know that?
Jesus, looks like he got hit with napalm.
Hey man, whatcha doing? Come on man, don't fuck around! Hey! Hey! Don't do that! Come on, man. Whatcha doing that for? Stop!
